advisories: Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
releaseNotes: You’ve been invited as a Drinking Buddy! Install Beer Buddy now to see who’s drinking, what they’re having, and where they’re hanging out—live.
description:
Beer Buddy is the private social app made for you and your drinking crew.

Get instant notifications when your friends are grabbing a beer or hanging out, so you can join in. You’ll also get alerts when your friends are out drinking—never miss another party. Open the map to see who’s already out and jump into the fun.

No public feeds, no random followers. Just your close friends, great drinks, and spontaneous meet-ups.

----------------------------------------
WHAT YOU CAN DO
----------------------------------------

* Get notified when your friends drink  
Receive instant alerts the moment they open a drink, wherever they are.  
"Alex just checked in a beer in Miami." When you open a drink, your crew gets notified.

* Live map of your friends  
See who’s drinking—and where. Perfect for spontaneous hangouts or just feeling close from afar.

* Snap photos with every drink  
Capture the moment, tag friends, and share the vibe.

* Track your drinks and memories  
Beer Buddy creates your personal drinking diary. Scroll through past nights, see what you drank, where you were, and who you shared those moments with.

* Choose from 50,000+ drinks  
Beer, cocktails, wine, mocktails, soda—whatever you’re having, quickly find it, check in, and share it privately with your group.

* Friendly stats and private leaderboard  
No judgment—just fun. See how many drinks you’ve had, discover what your friends are drinking, and find out who’s been most active this month.

* Send cheers, not texts  
With one tap, react to friends’ drinks with a quick "Cheers," an "I’m on my way," or simply toast them from afar—no texts needed.

----------------------------------------
BUILT FOR YOUR CIRCLE—NOT THE WHOLE WORLD

Beer Buddy is invite-only. Only your selected friends see your drinks. All photos and sessions stay private. No random people—just your crew.
----------------------------------------

PERFECT FOR
- Staying close with friends in different cities
- Planning spontaneous nights out
- Sharing drinks and inside jokes
- Keeping track of fun memories

----------------------------------------
WHY PEOPLE LOVE BEER BUDDY

"It’s like a private map, but for drinking with real friends."
"Feels like my friends are always with me, even when we’re miles apart."
"No followers, no likes. Just my people, drinking together."

JOIN 7+ MILLION USERS WHO ONLY DRINK WITH FRIENDS  
Install Beer Buddy now and raise your first toast. Drinking is always better together.

We’re always excited to hear from you! Email us at support@beerbuddy.app

Please play and drink responsibly. Alcohol consumption is not required.
